text: Churguldy () is a rural locality (a selo) in Akbulatovsky Selsoviet, Tatyshlinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 488 as of 2010. There are 6 streets. == Geography == It is located 55 km from Verkhniye Tatyshly, 5 km from Staroakbulatovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Tatyshlinsky District
title: Churguldy
